summary: Wrap GRPC CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors in a unified SDK Timeout exception for the Update feature, allowing users to catch a single predictable exception instead of handling multiple gRPC error types.
userImpact: Users must currently catch multiple gRPC error types for timeout scenarios in Updates; wrapping them in a single SDK exception simplifies error handling.
proposedFix: Create an SDK-level Timeout exception that wraps GRPC::CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors for Update operations.
resolutionDetails: Implementation details referenced in the features repository issue #483.
keyQuote: So that users only have to catch one predictable exception
